ygData.subject: RE: PvP strategies for cler
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to contradict the spirit of your mail, but thought I d just point out that the PGT can only be wielded by Warriors, Paladins, Rangers, Rogues,
ygData.messageBody:
Not to contradict the spirit of your mail, but thought I'd just point out
that the PGT can only be wielded by Warriors, Paladins, Rangers, Rogues,
Shadowknights, Bards and Shamans. So you won't find many casters taking
advantage of it.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Chas Watkins [mailto:cwatkins@...]
> Sent: 03 September 1999 19:26
> To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] PvP strategies for cler
>
>
> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
> See previous email. You are wrong and no need to be so
> adamant. We are all
> here to learn. There are plenty of items that do similar things. The
> polished tomahawk I mentioned earlier is a 1h slash item that
> if wielded by
> a level 10 caster often gives berserker effect. Which gives
> the user about
> 100 hit points of invulnerability. As I explained earlier
> this caused me to
> loose to a range 2 levels lower than me by a large margin!
>
